title: Account not logging in
body:
When I tried to Login to my main account today, it just acted like my account didnt exist or I had entered the wrong Password. Error massage: "Username or Password is incorrect. Please try logging in again. If you have forgotten your Password, click here". I tried to recover my username and my Password and on the Website it said "Account name has been sent to the specified Email address." but I did not receive an email. Strange Thing is, my smurf account is totally fine: I can Login to the launcher, I can recover my username and Password... Anyone having the same Problems or any idea what the Problem might be?
Btw, this is not my main account, cause I cant log in on the Homepage either.

replies.body: When I tried to Login to my main account today, i got a red message above username "You have tried logging in too many times in a short period of time. Please wait a while before retrying". So i wait a little and again the same. Afrer 3h i tried again, and again the same. I did the "Repair" and it didnt help, then i delete lol and instal it again, and even that didnt help, im getting the same answer "You have tried logging in too many times in a short period of time. Please wait a while before retrying". I tried even on oteher acc and again the same. Pls help

Unless the patcher is connected to the wrong region, we can help with recovering your account!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account recovery team can assist.  We can look into updating your information, and will reply back as soon as we can!
